Key Match Events: Randal Kolo Muani scored the first goal against the run of play in the 30th minute.
Ousmane Dembele scored a stunning second goal in the 57th minute.
Kylian Mbappe looked to make up for lost time upon his introduction, going close on three occasions.
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschampsâ€™ side ultimately made their fortune count, with an accomplished second-half display.
Belgium started well, but once France opened the scoring, they looked remarkably short of ideas.
N'Golo Kante was instrumental to France gaining a measure of control in the first half and played a role in both goals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match highlights included a post hitting the crossbar for Belgium and a chance for Belgium when Lukebakio was through on goal.
Key stats showed six goals in a row for France scored by PSG players.
